fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Culture and media, Trade, Consumers, Culture, International co-operation and development, Education and training, Business and Industry, Environment, Youth, Single market, Research and innovation, Public Health, Transport, Borders and Security
membership:
Mr Pietro Carlomagno has been registered since 2004 in the Registry of Qualified Accountants and Bookkeepers of Milan (in Italian Albo dei Dottori Commercialisti e degli Esperti Contabili di Milano) and he has joined the Funding and Calls Commission of Accountants and Bookkeepers of Milan on May 2018. His working experience is focused on financial, tax, accounting, legal and audit of small and medium-large enterprises, with a qualification in contexts connected to service and  financial sector (lending institution, Bank of Italy regulations - Uif). 
 
http://www.odcec.mi.it/
relevant_communication:
Mr Pietro Carlomagno has also attended or organized the following events/conferences: 
 
- "Fare politica. Politiche locali per una scelta sostenibile. Partecipazione, condivisione, innovazione per l'Italia in Europa (in English "Policy making. Local policies for a sustainable choice. Participation, sharing, innovation for Italy in Europe") with the participation of Mr Gianni Pittella the former Vice-President of the European Parliament (Milan, on 10-12 November 2017).  
 
- "L’Europa che vogliamo, integrazione, sviluppo, inclusione sociale" (in English "The Europe we want, integration, development and social inclusion", as speaker at conference with European parliamentarians, politicians and local representatives, experts from the European Cohesion policy (Milan, on 12 February 2016). 
 
- "Milano Europa con Beppe Sala " (in English "Milan- Europe with Beppe Sala"), as speaker at event with European parliamentarians, politicians and local representatives, experts from the European Cohesion policies (Milan, on  04 February 2016).  
 
- "Risopriamo la vera Europa"  (in English "Let’s go to rediscover the real Europe"), an event organized by Italian MEPs, where I have actively participated in working tables for proposals related to European innovation (Milan, on 28 November 2015).  
 
- "Europa, Enti locali, Università e Imprese: come cooperare per lo sviluppo" (in English "Europe, local authorities, universities and companies: how to cooperate for the development" round table organized with cultural and political associations, enterprises, local authorities and universities, and representatives of the European Parliament. (Milan, November 2012).
